Title: Object: The eve of the flight
Description: The Holy Family on the eve of the flight into Egypt, after Corbould, with the Virgin lying at centre, Christ child sleeping in his cradle beside her, and Joseph sitting on a chair at left; an angel appears and points at a scene in the background representing the Holy Family on their way into Egypt, while to the left soldiers are seen massacring children Etching and engraving
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (not described)
